mapper.select: select DISTINCT perms from sys_user_role as ur left join blog.sys_role_menu srm on ur.role_id = srm.role_id left join blog.sys_menu sm on srm.menu_id = sm.id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and sm.menu_type in ('C', 'F') and sm.status = '0' and sm.del_flag = '0'

select DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms, '') AS perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from blog.sys_menu m where m.menu_type in ('C', 'M') and m.status = '0' and m.del_flag = '0' order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.visible, m.status, IFNULL(m.perms, '') AS perms, m.is_frame, m.menu_type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_user_role as ur left join blog.sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id left join blog.sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.menu_type in ('C', 'M') and m.status = '0' and m.del_flag = '0' order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
